  • Constructor Details

    • Movie

      public Movie(int movieID, String movieTitle, ShowingStatus showingStatus, String synopsis, String movieDirector, String cast, String genres, MovieRating movieRating, int movieDuration, double profitEarned, double overallRatingScore, LocalDate releaseDate, LocalDate endOfShowingDate, MovieType movieType)
      This constructor is used to create a new Movie object
      Parameters:
      movieID - This is the movie's ID
      movieTitle - This is the movie's name
      showingStatus - This is the movie's showingStatus
      synopsis - This is the movie's synopsis
      movieDirector - This is the movie's director(s)
      cast - This is the movie's casts
      genres - This is the movie's genres
      movieRating - This is the movie's rating
      movieDuration - This is the movie's duration
      profitEarned - This is the movie's total profit earned
      overallRatingScore - This is the movie's overall rating score
      releaseDate - This is the movie's release date
      endOfShowingDate - This is the movie's end of showing date
      movieType - This is the movie's movie type
